entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
